full_summary:
typedef Government Tender Announcement
=====================

* Title (English): PSIB RFB for Category 3 Storage Lockers
* Title (French): SAEA IAS pour casiers de stockage AMA de catégorie 3
* Reference Number: PW-22-01018808
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: T5037-220049
* Publication Date: 2022-12-23
* Closing Date: 2023-01-11T15:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired

### Introduction

Transport Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture, including storage lockers, to Winnipeg, Manitoba.

### Requirements

* Product Category: Office Furniture - Installation, Cabinets, Lockers, Bins and Shelving - Installation (G/SIN: JI7110, JI7125)
* Timeframe: Delivery and installation must be completed by March 15, 2023
* Security Requirements: Apply (consult the bid solicitation document)
* Trade Agreements: Set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business

### Solicitation Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposals
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Manitoba

### Contact Information

* Name: Anthony Senauth
* Email: [anthony.senauth@tc.gc.ca](mailto:anthony.senauth@tc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 204-590-8905
* Office Address: 344 Edmonton Street, Winnipeg, MB R3B 2L4
* Fax: Not available

### Attachments

You can access the following documents related to this tender:

* Tender Amendment 001
* Tender Amendment 002
* Tender Amendment 003
* Solictiation Document (English)
* Solictiation Document (French)

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2022-12-23
* Closing Date: 2023-01-11T15:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-01-09

The rewritten entry aims to present the information in a clear and concise manner while providing the most important details to interested parties. It also follows a more professional tone and format. Let me know if you'd like me to revise anything!
